projectPurpose: To install, manage, and update the official Fuel blockchain development toolchain.
mainFeatures: Simplify setup for Sway applications (forc, fuel-core)

alternatives.name: rustup
mainFeatures: Install official Rust release channels (stable, beta, nightly)

alternatives.name: SDKMAN!
platforms: Unix-based systems (macOS, Linux, Cygwin, Solaris, FreeBSD)
mainFeatures: Manage multiple versions of JVM SDKs (Java, Groovy, Scala, Kotlin)
Install, switch, remove, and list candidates

alternatives.name: asdf
mainFeatures: Plugin system for multiple languages and tools

alternatives.name: foreman
mainFeatures: Toolchain manager for Roblox development tools

alternatives.name: zigup
mainFeatures: Can include ZLS (Zig Language Server) installation

marketPositioning: fuelup is positioned as the essential, official toolchain installer and manager specifically for the Fuel blockchain development ecosystem. Unlike general-purpose version managers or those focused on mainstream languages, fuelup provides a tailored experience for Fuel developers, simplifying the installation and management of critical Fuel components like forc and fuel-core. Its inspiration from rustup suggests a focus on providing a robust and reliable developer experience within its specific niche, making it a foundational tool for building on Fuel.
